column4: someone give me a hand. Mounted FTP servers are opening in Firefox when selected from the places menu. i want them to open in File Browser. Please, can someone help?
tried gftp? works wonders for me!
The default action is nautilus. i tried gFTP, don't like it. Nautilus handles FTP directories fine. I can't figure out how to change the default action
This happened after I set firefox as the default browser
Heres an idea. What does everyone have in System > preferences > preferred applications
Storm: hmm..interesting...when I open ssh using places to my server it opens it in nautilus...will just check ftp
Come on. 2 clicks and it could help a lot
After i set firefox as the default browser
it said it wasn't so I foolish clicked "set as default browser"
storm: interesting...lets see if there's a way to reverse that
I fixed it, thanks to someone in gnome
I checked the gconf for ftp links
storm: cool...how did u do it?
